review_text: 以前のバージョンのKindle電子書籍リーダーを持っていて、外出先で本をダウンロードできましたが、何かが足りないと感じていました。いくつかのアップグレードを経て、プレゼントとしてこれを手に入れましたが、基本的に足りなかったものがすべて含まれていると思います。とても軽量でコンパクトなので、簡単にバッグに入れたり、片手で使ったりできます。バックライトが付いていて、寝ている夫を邪魔することもなく、明るすぎて気が散ることもありません。さまざまな明るさで読書するのにちょうど良い光の量です。暗い部屋での読書から明るい日中の屋外での読書まで、自動調整できます。
review_title: 素晴らしい電子リーダー、苦情なし

review_text: so far so good,,,, wife very happy. misses her old one....

Excellent Ereader if that is all you are looking for. Probably a bit over priced for the casual reader, the Voyage is wonderful for those looking for the best reading experience and are willing to pay the price tag and trade the lack of functionality.

Definitely easy on the eyes for long reading sessions, especially when compared to the LCD screens of smart phones and tablets. The only issues we had were that it drops the connection to our WiFi network and then won't connect to the Kindle store. I don't think it's an issue with my network since all our other devices don't have the connectivity issues we had with this.
review_title: Worked well except for some connectivity issues

review_text: Have had it for a while noe. A littlebit unusual to press so hard to change page but now starting to get used to it.
review_title: Okay so far, nothing to mentioned bad or especiall

review_text: 私は新しいKindle Voyageに非常に満足しています。テキストは非常にシャープでクリアで、画像はKindle Paperwhiteよりもはるかに良く見えます。デバイスは非常に軽く、持ちやすいです。適応型フロントライトも素晴らしいです。KindleアプリをインストールしたiPadも持っていますが、Kindle Voyageでの読書体験はそれよりもはるかに優れており、この購入を全く後悔していません。
review_title: 素晴らしい電子書籍リーダー

review_text: The Kindle is great for just reading books, and the battery power is pretty good.The experimental browser is not very user friendly.

Even though it is a little pricy, I like my new Kindle Voyage. It looks smaller, but it is because it's only the screen - no buttons. It is lightweight. You can scroll and turn pages with touch screen press or with physical small buttons on the side. It is automatically adjusts to different light conditions.
The original electronic book. Bought it for my wife who reads paper book at two to three a week. She's hooked and loves the Kindle.
This kindle has easier viewing and the light adjustment is great.
review_title: We bought it for our son and he loves it.

review_text: Im happy to have it. Very comfortable and easy to use every where

This is my eighth Kindle. Some others were either lost or screen-damaged. I bought it as a spare. Current model is better looking than earlier versions (white case), sturdier, and has an improved screen. Great price also; wish I'd bought two.
My nephew is going to college next year and we want to give him a gift. Kindle suits it well for him to learn and study.
Excellent lightweight way to take a lot of reading materials along when traveling.

I love my Kindle! I'm back to reading so much more often as I always have several books with me at all times! At first it surprised me that this version doesn't have a back light and you need a light to read, but I actually like it now as I don't get the eye strain like I do when using my phone.

本の実物を持つのが好きですが、これらは旅行や本棚を軽くするのに最適です。大きなサイズのパッドを買わずに、もっと大きなストレージを持つものを買えたらいいのにと思います。また、4ギガバイトの容量があるのに、1ギガバイトがOSと広告に使われているのは残念です。本当に？PDFを読むのに1ギガバイトのOSが必要なんて。残念です。最後に変えたいのは、夜に目に優しいように、文字を白くして背景を黒くできるようにすることです。
It's a perfect gift for young adult during the holiday session.
The screen is too dark, and cannot adjust the brightness
review_title: The screen is too dark, and cannot adjust it

review_text: I should have purchased a kindle sooner. It's easy to use and I love it!
This was purchased as a gift and they've absolutely loved it.

product_name: Amazon Echo Show Alexa-enabled Bluetooth Speaker with 7" Screen
review_text: We bought the two-for deal as presents. My mother will have a learning curve, but since the other one is going to my son, he can teach her! Looks like a neat appliance, but want to see if it can do more than weather, music and turning off the lights...
review_title: Christmas presents for my mother and son

product_name: Amazon Echo Show Alexa-enabled Bluetooth Speaker with 7" Screen
review_text: 私のお気に入りのAmazon製品です。家のすべての寝室に1つ購入しました。

product_name: Amazon Echo Show Alexa-enabled Bluetooth Speaker with 7" Screen
review_text: Very fun to have music at the ready with a voice command. We use it with Amazon Unlimited which has nearly everything. Good to view recipes with Allrecipes, so we keep it in the kitchen for reference and musical ambience. The video is good too, it has youtube functionality. It would be nice to have regular tv though, but that is probably on the providers for now.. nice to have the photo background and lastly, to have lyrics on the screen when music is played!

product_name: Amazon Echo Show Alexa-enabled Bluetooth Speaker with 7" Screen
review_text: I was using the original Echo seldomly. Then I decided to get the Show... I use the Show a lot more. Was simple to set up and you can make calls with video. Great product

product_name: Amazon Echo Show Alexa-enabled Bluetooth Speaker with 7" Screen
review_text: I have to say it was a little confusing and frustrating when i was not getting the verification code from amazon , i waited for 20 minutes then i requested another code, nothing... then a nother one... and still nothing , i started to set up the device at 8.30 am and by 11.20 am i was fed up with it.. i had to step away.... after about 5 hours we went shopping and at the mall i recieved about 4 codes from amazon ....

product_name: Amazon Echo Show Alexa-enabled Bluetooth Speaker with 7" Screen
review_text: Gift for a relative they said they loved the gift.
review_title: Gave as a gift they loved it.

product_name: Amazon Echo Show Alexa-enabled Bluetooth Speaker with 7" Screen
review_text: Same as echo but with a screen which adds to the appeal to this product.

product_name: Amazon Echo Show Alexa-enabled Bluetooth Speaker with 7" Screen
review_text: Purchased this because I was buying the echo dot for my daughter and thought this would be fun for the family. We play music every day on it. Every one in the family is enjoying it. Only dislike is that it doesn‚Äôt have the hub.

product_name: Amazon Echo Show Alexa-enabled Bluetooth Speaker with 7" Screen
review_text: I live the echo show! So easy to set up and use. I have one in the kitchen and one in our main bathroom.

product_name: Amazon Echo Show Alexa-enabled Bluetooth Speaker with 7" Screen
review_text: Alexa may be new, but I would have thought some of the simple commands she would have been able to respond to already. For the amount Amazon charges, it should come with better instructions, including what specifically to download into one's device (iPhone, etc.) so as to make some apps ready to go. Amazon dropped the ball on this one.
review_title: not as intelligent as I was told
